channel.title: CVE Feed for Fortinet -- Fortinet FortiAnalyzer, FortiManager
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Fortinet -- Fortinet FortiAnalyzer, FortiManager

item.title: CVE-2022-39950|2024-08-03T12:07:43.095Z -- fortinet -- fortinet%20fortianalyzer%2C%20fortimanager
item.description: An improper neutralization of input during web page generation vulnerability [CWE-79] exists in FortiManager and FortiAnalyzer 6.0.0 all versions, 6.2.0 all versions, 6.4.0 through 6.4.8, and 7.0.0 through 7.0.4. Report templates may allow a low privilege level attacker to perform an XSS attack via posting a crafted CKeditor "protected" comment as described in CVE-2020-9281.
